message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Seems fair to me!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I'm willing to give you a little more, Bob, but I'm not going to be taken advantage of. Let's find a compromise.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share. The money is losing value fast, let's make a deal!
This is my final offer, Bob.  I'm not willing to give you any more, but I'm also not going to let you take advantage of the situation.  Let's end this now.
